thread.title: Ole Miss OL Christian Morris hospitalized with neck injury after collapsing on field
thread.title_full: Ole Miss OL Christian Morris hospitalized with neck injury after collapsing on field | AL.com

author: Creg Stephenson | cstephenson@al.com
title: Ole Miss OL Christian Morris hospitalized with neck injury after collapsing on field
text:
Ole Miss offensive lineman Christian Morris was hospitalized with a neck injury after collapsing on the field at the end of the first half Saturday night against Texas A&M.
Morris, a sophomore, collapsed after walking off the field following an Ole Miss field goal on the final play of the half. He was strapped to a backboard and taken via ambulance to a local hospital.
Ole Miss released an update on his status at halftime:
Christian Morris has been ruled out with a neck injury and has been taken to the hospital for further evaluation
